reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, comfortable, and appreciate that it can be dressed up or down. The fit and quality receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits true to size and has great quality, others find it too small and feel it's cheaply made. The material quality is also mixed, with some praising it while others find it feels cheap, and the color accuracy varies between amazing and not as expected. Select to learn more Looks Comfort Dressability Fit Quality Material quality Color accuracy Belt 52 customers mention "Looks" 43 positive 9 negative Customers find the dress beautiful, particularly appreciating its perfect color for fall parties. "...It’s cute though. Wore it for a date night and it photographs super well just buy your real size. I’m a size 16 normally buy an XL." Read more "Actually super cute . Very thin, feels more like pajamas. It is see through." Read more " Beautiful and flattering! I am a size 14 and I felt so comfortable in this dress for a Valentine’s Day date to Moulin Rouge...." Read more " Beautiful dress . Bought it black and teal. Super comfy to wear...." Read more 12 customers mention "Comfort" 11 positive 1 negative Customers find the dress comfortable. Not heavy in the heat and super comfy . It was like a fake silk look but not bad at all...." Read more "Beautiful and flattering! I can dress it up or down and it works great!" Read more "Love this dress. It’s soft, comfy and you can dress up or down . My hubby really likes it so it passed the test. Would buy again" Read more "Super comfy, cute and can be dressed up or down ! Absolutely loved it for a night out in Vegas" Read more "...It’s comfortable and can be dressed up or casual . This color seems to be a little bit too shiny for me. Makes it seem like pajama top...." It is a fairly short dress so keep that in mind." Read more "Perfect length for me. Super nice material easy to wash!..." "The color was totally OFF . It only takes one time with me though, I hope this helps." Read more "Was not flattering. Color was exact , quality was okay" Read more "Did not come with a belt, completely different color than shown and doesn’t fit like a dress. I’m only 5’0”, and it falls just below my waist." Read more "I really do love the style of this dress! And the colors are beautiful . Originally ordered the green in L, but it was enormous on me...." "The belt was missing . Without the belt it’s over sized and baggy and looks like something you’d wear to bed. Highly disappointed, not worth the money." It wasn’t in the medium. I ordered the champagne-ish color. I’m wearing it, but I do wish I had the belt!" items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and versatile
items.body: Love love loveeeee, able to dress up or down. Fabric is soft and flowy. Size is accurate and color is as pictured in the listing. Got so many compliments! Read more
items.author: sara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect night out dress!
items.body: My favorite night out dress, it’s so sexy. I’m 5,7 120lb and a small fit me perfectly. The material is thin and lightweight great for a warm night. Read more
items.author: Manderzlifestyle

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute party dress but wrinkles easily.
items.body: Great fit and cute dress. Material does feel cheap and had a weird film on it at first. Color is vibrant. Wrinkles easily and unsure how to wash. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars See through
items.body: Actually super cute. Very thin, feels more like pajamas. It is see through. Read more
items.author: kelley

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress
items.body: Loved the way this dress fits, material is very lingerie like. 4 of the buttons were completely broken in half. Returned this dress. Read more
items.author: Beda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO GOOD!
items.body: Beautiful dress. Bought it black and teal. Super comfy to wear. Went with XXL, mainly for length and glad I did but could have easily worn the XL if I wasn’t worried about the length. Feels like quality satin and was fairly breathable to the outdoor concert. The belt that comes with it is a good length. No belt loops on the dress. No pockets. Buttons stay closed easily. Can make this super sexy or fairly conservative depending on the outfit you want to create. The quality feels great for the price. It had some wrinkles upon arrival which is to be expected but they easily came out with a 5 min steam. Would order again if I needed another color! Read more
items.author: AEL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as advertised.
items.body: I ordered this dress in XL for my birthday and it fit perfectly while 8 months pregnant. I’m typically a size M-L but It’s true to size so order your true fit. Loved the comfort, color, and quality. Very diverse for any occasion. Read more
items.author: MLJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and fall look!
items.body: I’m 5’8”, 140 Dcup. Ordered a MED and it perfectly. It irons really well and I did not need a slip under it. I did rub a dryer sheet all over the inside to prevent the static and that helped really well. The belt is detached but if you double knot it, it didn’t loosen for me. It was a perfect color for a fall party! Very happy with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Kim

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Bc, Brown, Deep Pink, Navy Blue-02, Orange, Red, Wine Red, Khaki, White, 01-hot Pink, 01-black, Deep Purple, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
